text: Heavy metal may mean: *Heavy metals, chemical elements within a particular range of atomic weights *Heavy metal music, a style of music *Heavy Metal (magazine), an American fantasy magazine based on the French magazine Métal Hurlant *Heavy Metal (movie), a 1981 animated movie based on the magazine, or its sequel Heavy Metal 2000 *Heavy Metal: F.A.K.K.², a 2000 computer game for Mac and PC by Gathering of Developers *"Heavy Metal", a 1978 song by Sammy Hagar, best known for being used for the 1981 movie of the same name *"Heavy Metal", a song by Judas Priest from Ram It Down *HeavyMetal, software for BattleTech
title: Heavy metal
